lines: Le se keng la lebala, Sabbatha ’a Molimo;
Ke e ntle ho feta matsatsi a mang ’ohle,
Le ea re phomotsa mesebetsing ea rona;
E re tlisetsa phomolo e tsoang holimong.
Le amohele ka thabo tsatsi la Sabbatha,
Le amohele ka thabo tsatsi la Sabbatha.
E halaletse u mo rapele kajeno;
Ea itseng ho barutuoa, Ke ’na tsela ’phelang,
O tla re fa metsi a bophelo bo sa feleng
Tsatsing le khethiloeng, thabelang nako e ntle;
Binela Jesu, e leng motsoalle oa bana,
A ’Moloki ea mosa O lokile hakaakang
Tsepiso ea bohlokoa ’tla aha pelong tsohle.
